Uses a pre-initialized random number generator to calculate a double value between 0 and 1.

Uses a pre-initialized random number generator to calculate a float value between 0 and 1.
randomInt(int) - Static method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Utility
Uses its pre-initialized random number generator to get the next integer within the range [0,n).
randomOrder(int) - Static method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Utility
Makes an array with numbers 0->n-1 in random order

Redraws the entire world.

Tells the Cell to reproduce, returning a new daughter Cell.
resetSimulation() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Comets
Resets the currently running simulation to the initial state it was loaded in, or the most recently saved layout.

Tells the World2D to respawn the amount of media it knows to respawn, where its supposed to respawn it.
run() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Cell
Tells the Cell to run an internal process and return some value.
run() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Model
Every Model should be instructed at some point to run, and return some kind of integer state value at the end of its run.
run() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.World2D
This is the main thing that the World2D should do - run a simulation.
